CellDrift TutorialÂ¶

CellDrift is a python package for the evaluation of temporal perturbation effects using single-cell RNA-sequencing data.

  • Get to know more about the background the project.

  • Discuss usage on Discourse and development on GitHub.

  • Get started by browsing tutorials, usage principles or the main API.

  • Check out our contributing guide for development practices.

  • Consider citing the original paper bioRxiv (2022).
